ASBESTOS REMOVAL

ARD are one of the countries leading and most experienced & accredited multi disciplined environmental & industrial services contractors.

IT'S TIME TO GET SERIOUS ABOUT ASBESTOS

The asbestos industry now operates at the high end as a sophisticated safety and process-driven contract discipline.

ARD apply the most effective techniques for asbestos removal, supported by detailed method statements designed to ensure best practice at all times. We offer an experienced labour force, supported by a well maintained plant portfolio.

Our Key Services

ARD's reputation has been built up since the company formation in 1998 starting as an asbestos removal contractor before expanding our services we have delivered projects nationwide and more recently have expanded into the European & African markets.

ASBESTOS SERVICES

All ARD’s projects are managed safely within all current industry legislation & approved codes of practice and Health & Safety Executives guidance notes.

ARD’s quality assurance is recognised through the number of long term clients who we continue to assist and undertake asbestos related services for nationwide.

ARD’s approach to all asbestos removal is planned to cause the minimal amount of inconvenience to our clients and others working around us.

INDUSTRIAL DISMANTLING

Deconstruction or dismantling of an industrial site is sometimes preferable to just demolishing it. Certain machinery or steel (metal) structures require specialized dismantling & re-erection services as the ones our company provides.

SOFT STRIP & HARD DEMOLITION

Soft Strip Demolition | Rip out Demolition | Strip Out Demolition | De-Construction

Working alongside main contractors, planning consultants and major UK developers, and benefiting from our in house highly skilled work force, ARD offers a quality soft stip demolition service, providing a comprehensive solution.
